gunnery.name: Gunnery
gunnery.description: Basic skill for operating weapon turrets. 2% bonus to turret damage per level.

small_projectile.name: Small Projectile Turret
small_projectile.description: Skill at using small projectile weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

small_energy.name: Small Energy Turret
small_energy.description: Skill at using small energy weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

missiles.name: Missiles
missiles.description: Basic skill for missile launcher operation. 2% bonus to missile damage per level.

light_missiles.name: Light Missiles
light_missiles.description: Operation of light missile launchers. 5% bonus to flight time per level.

spaceship_command.name: Spaceship Command
spaceship_command.description: Basic skill for flying spaceships. 2% bonus to ship agility per level.

minmatar_frigate.name: Minmatar Frigate
minmatar_frigate.description: Skill at flying Minmatar frigates. Per level bonus varies by ship.

caldari_frigate.name: Caldari Frigate
caldari_frigate.description: Skill at flying Caldari frigates. Per level bonus varies by ship.

shield_operation.name: Shield Operation
shield_operation.description: Skill at operating shield systems. 5% bonus to shield recharge per level.

shield_management.name: Shield Management
shield_management.description: Skill at managing shield systems. 5% bonus to shield HP per level.

hull_upgrades.name: Hull Upgrades
hull_upgrades.description: Skill at upgrading ship hulls. Allows fitting of armor plates and hull modification modules.

navigation.name: Navigation
navigation.description: Skill at maneuvering ships. 5% bonus to ship velocity per level.

afterburner.name: Afterburner
afterburner.description: Skill at using afterburner modules. 10% reduction in capacitor use per level.

targeting.name: Targeting
targeting.description: Basic targeting skill. One additional target per level.

long_range_targeting.name: Long Range Targeting
long_range_targeting.description: Advanced targeting skill. 5% bonus to targeting range per level.

medium_projectile.name: Medium Projectile Turret
medium_projectile.description: Skill at using medium projectile weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

medium_energy.name: Medium Energy Turret
medium_energy.description: Skill at using medium energy weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

medium_hybrid.name: Medium Hybrid Turret
medium_hybrid.description: Skill at using medium hybrid weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

heavy_missiles.name: Heavy Missiles
heavy_missiles.description: Operation of heavy missile launchers. 5% bonus to explosion radius per level.

rapid_launch.name: Rapid Launch
rapid_launch.description: Reduces missile launcher reload time. 3% reduction per level.

minmatar_destroyer.name: Minmatar Destroyer
minmatar_destroyer.description: Skill at flying Minmatar destroyers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

caldari_destroyer.name: Caldari Destroyer
caldari_destroyer.description: Skill at flying Caldari destroyers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

gallente_frigate.name: Gallente Frigate
gallente_frigate.description: Skill at flying Gallente frigates. Per level bonus varies by ship.

amarr_frigate.name: Amarr Frigate
amarr_frigate.description: Skill at flying Amarr frigates. Per level bonus varies by ship.

gallente_destroyer.name: Gallente Destroyer
gallente_destroyer.description: Skill at flying Gallente destroyers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

amarr_destroyer.name: Amarr Destroyer
amarr_destroyer.description: Skill at flying Amarr destroyers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

minmatar_cruiser.name: Minmatar Cruiser
minmatar_cruiser.description: Skill at flying Minmatar cruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

caldari_cruiser.name: Caldari Cruiser
caldari_cruiser.description: Skill at flying Caldari cruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

gallente_cruiser.name: Gallente Cruiser
gallente_cruiser.description: Skill at flying Gallente cruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

amarr_cruiser.name: Amarr Cruiser
amarr_cruiser.description: Skill at flying Amarr cruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

drones.name: Drones
drones.description: Basic drone operation. Allows control of 1 drone per level.

light_drones.name: Light Drone Operation
light_drones.description: Skill at controlling light combat drones. 5% bonus to damage per level.

medium_drones.name: Medium Drone Operation
medium_drones.description: Skill at controlling medium combat drones. 5% bonus to damage per level.

heavy_drones.name: Heavy Drone Operation
heavy_drones.description: Skill at controlling heavy combat drones. 5% bonus to damage per level.

drone_durability.name: Drone Durability
drone_durability.description: Increases drone hitpoints. 5% bonus per level.

drone_navigation.name: Drone Navigation
drone_navigation.description: Increases drone speed. 5% bonus per level.

drone_interfacing.name: Drone Interfacing
drone_interfacing.description: Advanced drone control. 10% bonus to drone damage per level.

electronic_warfare.name: Electronic Warfare
electronic_warfare.description: Basic electronic warfare skills. Required for EWAR modules.

weapon_disruption.name: Weapon Disruption
weapon_disruption.description: Skill at using tracking disruptors and guidance disruptors. 5% bonus per level.

propulsion_jamming.name: Propulsion Jamming
propulsion_jamming.description: Skill at using webifiers and warp scramblers. 5% bonus to range per level.

armor_layering.name: Armor Layering
armor_layering.description: Optimizes armor plate effectiveness. 5% reduction in speed penalty per level.

mechanics.name: Mechanics
mechanics.description: Basic ship repair skill. 5% bonus to hull HP per level.

energy_grid_upgrades.name: Energy Grid Upgrades
energy_grid_upgrades.description: Skill at fitting power grid upgrade modules. 5% reduction in CPU use per level.

cpu_management.name: CPU Management
cpu_management.description: Increases ship CPU output. 5% bonus per level.

power_grid_management.name: Power Grid Management
power_grid_management.description: Increases ship power grid output. 5% bonus per level.

capacitor_management.name: Capacitor Management
capacitor_management.description: Increases ship capacitor capacity. 5% bonus per level.

capacitor_systems_operation.name: Capacitor Systems Operation
capacitor_systems_operation.description: Reduces capacitor recharge time. 5% bonus per level.

large_projectile.name: Large Projectile Turret
large_projectile.description: Skill at using large projectile weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

large_energy.name: Large Energy Turret
large_energy.description: Skill at using large energy weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

large_hybrid.name: Large Hybrid Turret
large_hybrid.description: Skill at using large hybrid weapons. 5% bonus to damage per level.

cruise_missiles.name: Cruise Missiles
cruise_missiles.description: Operation of cruise missile launchers. 5% bonus to flight time per level.

torpedoes.name: Torpedoes
torpedoes.description: Operation of torpedo launchers. 5% bonus to damage per level.

minmatar_battlecruiser.name: Minmatar Battlecruiser
minmatar_battlecruiser.description: Skill at flying Minmatar battlecruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

caldari_battlecruiser.name: Caldari Battlecruiser
caldari_battlecruiser.description: Skill at flying Caldari battlecruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

gallente_battlecruiser.name: Gallente Battlecruiser
gallente_battlecruiser.description: Skill at flying Gallente battlecruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

amarr_battlecruiser.name: Amarr Battlecruiser
amarr_battlecruiser.description: Skill at flying Amarr battlecruisers. Per level bonus varies by ship.

minmatar_battleship.name: Minmatar Battleship
minmatar_battleship.description: Skill at flying Minmatar battleships. Per level bonus varies by ship.

caldari_battleship.name: Caldari Battleship
caldari_battleship.description: Skill at flying Caldari battleships. Per level bonus varies by ship.

gallente_battleship.name: Gallente Battleship
gallente_battleship.description: Skill at flying Gallente battleships. Per level bonus varies by ship.

amarr_battleship.name: Amarr Battleship
amarr_battleship.description: Skill at flying Amarr battleships. Per level bonus varies by ship.

mining.name: Mining
mining.description: Skill for the operation of mining lasers. 5% bonus to mining yield per level.

astrogeology.name: Astrogeology
astrogeology.description: Advanced mining laser operation. 5% bonus to mining yield per level.

mining_upgrades.name: Mining Upgrades
mining_upgrades.description: Skill for operation of mining upgrade modules. Reduces CPU usage of mining upgrades by 5% per level.

mining_barge.name: Mining Barge
mining_barge.description: Skill for operation of mining barges. 5% bonus to ore hold capacity per level.

ice_harvesting.name: Ice Harvesting
ice_harvesting.description: Skill for the operation of ice harvesters. 5% reduction in ice harvester cycle time per level.

ice_processing.name: Ice Processing
ice_processing.description: Skill for refining ice into fuel and materials. 2% increase in ice refining yield per level.

exhumers.name: Exhumers
exhumers.description: Skill for operation of exhumer-class mining vessels. 3% bonus to mining yield per level.

reprocessing.name: Reprocessing
reprocessing.description: Basic ore processing skill. 3% increase in refining yield per level.

reprocessing_efficiency.name: Reprocessing Efficiency
reprocessing_efficiency.description: Advanced refining skill. 2% increase in refining yield per level.

science.name: Science
science.description: Basic knowledge of scientific principles. Required for various advanced operations.

gas_cloud_harvesting.name: Gas Cloud Harvesting
gas_cloud_harvesting.description: Skill for the operation of gas cloud harvesters. 5% bonus to gas harvester yield per level.

ore_compression.name: Ore Compression
ore_compression.description: Skill in compressing raw ore for efficient transport. Reduces compression waste by 2% per level.

moon_mining.name: Moon Mining
moon_mining.description: Understanding of moon extraction operations. Reduces extraction time by 4% per level.

moon_ore_processing.name: Moon Ore Processing
moon_ore_processing.description: Improved refining of moon ores. Increases moon ore reprocessing yield by 2% per level.

learning.name: Learning
learning.description: Improved skill training methods. Reduces all skill training times by 2% per level.

instant_recall.name: Instant Recall
instant_recall.description: Enhanced memory capacity. Increases Memory attribute by 1 per level.

analytical_mind.name: Analytical Mind
analytical_mind.description: Enhanced analytical abilities. Increases Intelligence attribute by 1 per level.

spatial_awareness.name: Spatial Awareness
spatial_awareness.description: Enhanced spatial perception. Increases Perception attribute by 1 per level.

iron_will.name: Iron Will
iron_will.description: Strengthened willpower. Increases Willpower attribute by 1 per level.

empathy.name: Empathy
empathy.description: Enhanced social awareness. Increases Charisma attribute by 1 per level.

social.name: Social
social.description: Improved social interactions. 5% bonus to NPC agent standing gains per level.

connections.name: Connections
connections.description: Leveraging personal contacts. Increases effective standing with friendly agents by 4% per level.

negotiation.name: Negotiation
negotiation.description: Improved bargaining skills. Increases mission ISK rewards by 5% per level.

fast_talk.name: Fast Talk
fast_talk.description: Reduces standing loss from declining agent missions by 5% per level.

criminal_connections.name: Criminal Connections
criminal_connections.description: Increases effective standing with hostile agents by 4% per level.

trade.name: Trade
trade.description: Increases the number of active market orders by 4 per level.

retail.name: Retail
retail.description: Further increases the number of active market orders by 8 per level.

accounting.name: Accounting
accounting.description: Reduces sales tax by 10% per level.

broker_relations.name: Broker Relations
broker_relations.description: Reduces broker fees by 5% per level.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.description: Ability to place sell orders remotely. Each level extends remote range.

procurement.name: Procurement
procurement.description: Ability to place buy orders remotely. Each level extends remote range.

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.description: Basic fleet command skill. Increases fleet member capacity by 2 per level.

mining_foreman.name: Mining Foreman
mining_foreman.description: Fleet command specialization for mining operations. 2% bonus to fleet mining yield per level.

skirmish_warfare.name: Skirmish Warfare
skirmish_warfare.description: Fleet command specialization for speed and agility. 2% bonus to fleet agility per level.

information_warfare.name: Information Warfare
information_warfare.description: Fleet command specialization for electronic warfare. 2% bonus to fleet sensor strength per level.

armored_warfare.name: Armored Warfare
armored_warfare.description: Fleet command specialization for armor tanking. 2% bonus to fleet armor HP per level.

siege_warfare.name: Siege Warfare
siege_warfare.description: Fleet command specialization for shield tanking. 2% bonus to fleet shield HP per level.

corporation_management.name: Corporation Management
corporation_management.description: Basic corporation management. Increases maximum corporation members by 20 per level.

starbase_defense_management.name: Starbase Defense Management
starbase_defense_management.description: Skill at managing starbase defense systems. Allows control of defense structures.

mechanic.name: Mechanic
mechanic.description: Knowledge of ship construction and repair. 5% bonus to hull HP per level.

repair_systems.name: Repair Systems
repair_systems.description: Operation of armor repair modules. 5% reduction in repair module duration per level.

jury_rigging.name: Jury Rigging
jury_rigging.description: Basic skill for installing ship rigs. Required for all rig installation.

cybernetics.name: Cybernetics
cybernetics.description: Skill at using cybernetic implants. Required for implant installation. Level 1 for basic, level 3 for limited, level 4 for standard implants.

infomorph_psychology.name: Infomorph Psychology
infomorph_psychology.description: Understanding of clone technology. Allows use of jump clones. Maximum jump clones equals skill level.

capital_ships.name: Capital Ships
capital_ships.description: Grants the ability to pilot capital ships. Requires mastery of Spaceship Command. Individual capital ship types require their faction's Battleship skill at level 5.

amarr_carrier.name: Amarr Carrier
amarr_carrier.description: Skill at operating Amarr carrier class ships.

caldari_carrier.name: Caldari Carrier
caldari_carrier.description: Skill at operating Caldari carrier class ships.

gallente_carrier.name: Gallente Carrier
gallente_carrier.description: Skill at operating Gallente carrier class ships.

minmatar_carrier.name: Minmatar Carrier
minmatar_carrier.description: Skill at operating Minmatar carrier class ships.

amarr_dreadnought.name: Amarr Dreadnought
amarr_dreadnought.description: Skill at operating Amarr dreadnought class ships.

caldari_dreadnought.name: Caldari Dreadnought
caldari_dreadnought.description: Skill at operating Caldari dreadnought class ships.

gallente_dreadnought.name: Gallente Dreadnought
gallente_dreadnought.description: Skill at operating Gallente dreadnought class ships.

minmatar_dreadnought.name: Minmatar Dreadnought
minmatar_dreadnought.description: Skill at operating Minmatar dreadnought class ships.

amarr_titan.name: Amarr Titan
amarr_titan.description: Skill at operating Amarr titan class ships.

caldari_titan.name: Caldari Titan
caldari_titan.description: Skill at operating Caldari titan class ships.

gallente_titan.name: Gallente Titan
gallente_titan.description: Skill at operating Gallente titan class ships.

minmatar_titan.name: Minmatar Titan
minmatar_titan.description: Skill at operating Minmatar titan class ships.

jump_drive_operation.name: Jump Drive Operation
jump_drive_operation.description: Skill at operating jump drives. 5% reduction in capacitor need per level.

jump_drive_calibration.name: Jump Drive Calibration
jump_drive_calibration.description: Advanced skill at using jump drives. 0.5 LY increase to jump range per level.

jump_fuel_conservation.name: Jump Fuel Conservation
jump_fuel_conservation.description: Skill at conserving fuel during jump drive operation. 10% reduction in fuel need per level.

cloaking.name: Cloaking
cloaking.description: Skill at using cloaking devices. 10% reduction in scan resolution penalty per level.

large_projectile_specialization.name: Large Projectile Turret Specialization
large_projectile_specialization.description: Advanced skill at using large projectile turrets. 2% damage bonus per level to Tech II large projectile turrets.

large_energy_specialization.name: Large Energy Turret Specialization
large_energy_specialization.description: Advanced skill at using large energy turrets. 2% damage bonus per level to Tech II large energy turrets.

large_hybrid_specialization.name: Large Hybrid Turret Specialization
large_hybrid_specialization.description: Advanced skill at using large hybrid turrets. 2% damage bonus per level to Tech II large hybrid turrets.

capital_projectile_turret.name: Capital Projectile Turret
capital_projectile_turret.description: Skill at using capital sized projectile turrets.

capital_energy_turret.name: Capital Energy Turret
capital_energy_turret.description: Skill at using capital sized energy turrets.

capital_hybrid_turret.name: Capital Hybrid Turret
capital_hybrid_turret.description: Skill at using capital sized hybrid turrets.

advanced_industry.name: Advanced Industry
advanced_industry.description: Advanced knowledge of industrial processes. 3% reduction in manufacturing time per level.

supply_chain_management.name: Supply Chain Management
supply_chain_management.description: Expertise in managing remote manufacturing operations. Increases number of remote manufacturing slots by 1 per level.

wing_command.name: Wing Command
wing_command.description: Advanced fleet command skill. Allows commanding a wing of up to 10 squad commanders. Increases wing member capacity by 1 per level.

fleet_command.name: Fleet Command
fleet_command.description: Elite fleet command skill. Allows commanding an entire fleet of up to 5 wings. Increases fleet capacity by 1 wing per level.

warfare_link_specialist.name: Warfare Link Specialist
warfare_link_specialist.description: Specialist skill for command burst modules. 2% bonus to command burst duration and strength per level.

armored_warfare_specialist.name: Armored Warfare Specialist
armored_warfare_specialist.description: Advanced armor warfare specialization. Allows use of Armored Command Burst charges. 3% bonus to armored command burst effects per level.

information_warfare_specialist.name: Information Warfare Specialist
information_warfare_specialist.description: Advanced information warfare specialization. Allows use of Information Command Burst charges. 3% bonus to information command burst effects per level.

siege_warfare_specialist.name: Siege Warfare Specialist
siege_warfare_specialist.description: Advanced siege warfare specialization. Allows use of Shield Command Burst charges. 3% bonus to shield command burst effects per level.

skirmish_warfare_specialist.name: Skirmish Warfare Specialist
skirmish_warfare_specialist.description: Advanced skirmish warfare specialization. Allows use of Skirmish Command Burst charges. 3% bonus to skirmish command burst effects per level.

mining_director.name: Mining Director
mining_director.description: Advanced mining fleet command. Allows use of Mining Foreman Burst charges. 3% bonus to mining fleet yield per level.
